author: Boing Boing's Shop
title: You can capture better video than ever with this AI-powered camera gimbal, now under $50
text:
TL;DR: Shaky hands and weird angles have ruined plenty of videos, but that'll never happen again with the
VYSN SmartHold 360° Rotation Smart AI Gimbal. This AI-powered camera tool allows you to record the best videos possible, and right now, it's on sale. Usually available for just $99, you can get it now for only $49.99.
We all take out our phones to record videos often, but how often have we looked back and been decided by the quality? A great way to avoid that disappointment is to invest in
a gimbal to allow you to put your camera in the right place — and with this one, the AI tech allows you to rotate with your desired scene in real time.
The
VYSN SmartHold 360° Rotation Smart AI Gimbal makes video recording easier and more efficient than ever. While it usually costs $99, you can now get it for just $49.99. That's an entire 50% off — no coupons needed!
It's not just the price that makes this such an incredible gimbal. Thanks to AI tech, it can track the movement your phone is recording and move around accordingly: up, down, left, right. That way, you'll film everything you desire. (The 360-degree rotation means you can really capture everything around you, too.) The gimbal also offers up different angles (shoot in horizontal or vertical mode!) and can alter its focus, too.
Simply put, it's like having your own assistant around to capture all your videos for you. You'll never get better recordings! It's a must-have for expert videographers and casual hobbyists alike.
(Just a note: This device doesn't come with batteries.)
So, transform the way you take videos and get the
 VYSN SmartHold 360° Rotation Smart AI Gimbal now for just $49.99. StackSocial prices subject to change.

author: 壹蘋新聞網
title: 不是濕疹！他狂癢3個月入院才知是「疥瘡」　還傳染全家都中標
text:
疥瘡是由一種小蟲「疥蟲」感染引起的皮膚病，常透過密切接觸傳播，尤其在家中、安養院或監所最容易群聚感染。感染後的潛伏期可長達2至6週，一開始沒症狀，但等身體產生過敏反應後，就會開始出現劇烈搔癢，尤其晚上特別嚴重。
一般疥瘡病人身上可能只有10～15隻蟲，但像這位阿公的「結痂型疥瘡」，身上可能上千隻蟲，不但症狀嚴重，傳染力也非常強。這種病容易和其他皮膚病搞混，所以得靠醫師用皮膚鏡找出蟲隧道，或刮皮膚檢查來確診。
治療疥瘡得靠外用藥或口服藥來殺蟲，重點是同住家人就算沒症狀也要一起治療，避免持續傳染。衣物、床單、毛巾也都要高溫清洗或封袋放置。北榮皮膚科提醒，如果全家都開始奇癢無比，別再拖了，趕快找皮膚科檢查清楚。
點擊閱讀下一則新聞
軍人優先「升等商務艙」4大問題！是否按軍階排序、長短程空位有限
topics: Crime, Law and Justice->human smuggling and trafficking

author: eirik@gamereactor.eu (Eirik Hyldbakk Furu)
title: Fallout 4's next-gen updates makes it prettier and better on PC, PS5 and Xbox Series later this month
text: [](/) [Dansk](https://www.gamereactor.dk/) [Svenska](https://www.gamereactor.se/) [Norsk](https://www.gamereactor.no/) [Suomi](https://www.gamereactor.fi/) [Deutsch](https://www.gamereactor.de/) [Italiano](https://www.gamereactor.it/) [Español](https://www.gamereactor.es/) [Português](https://www.gamereactor.pt/) [Français](https://www.gamereactor.fr/) [Nederlands](https://www.gamereactor.nl/) [中文版](https://www.gamereactor.cn/) [Indonesia](https://www.gamereactor.asia/) [Polski](https://www.gamereactor.pl/) [日本語](https://www.gamereactor.jp/) [한국어](https://www.gamereactor.kr/) [Česko](https://www.gamereactor.cz/) [Ελληνικά](https://www.gamereactor.gr/) [Türkçe](https://www.gamereactor.com.tr/) [Tiếng Việt](https://www.gamereactor.vn/) [عربي](https://www.gamereactor.me/) Bethesda surprised no one when they suddenly announced that Fallout 4's "next-gen" upgrade and PS5/Xbox Series versions [were delayed to 2024](https://www.gamereactor.eu/fallout-4s-ps5-and-xbox-series-versions-have-been-delayed-to-2024-1337833/) in the middle of last December. This led me to believe they wanted to have these things ready for the premiere of Amazon's [amazing](https://www.gamereactor.eu/fallout-season-one-1378413/) Fallout show. It seems like that was the plan, but that they just needed a bit more time. We're [told](https://fallout.bethesda.net/en/article/4s2bXQEbpcrsdCZhUYLHAi/fallout-4-is-getting-free-updates) that Fallout 4's free next-gen update will become available on the 25th of April, and that this obviously also means PS5 and Xbox Series versions will launch the same day. These versions of the game will let us choose between a Performance mode with 60 fps and a Quality mode with increased resolution, while offering improved stability improvements and other unspecified fixes. Not that those still enjoying themselves on PS4 or Xbox One have to feel left out, as the last-gen versions will also get a free update on the 25th of April that delivers stability improvements, login and quest fixes. All updates will also include a bunch of free Creation Club items, so I think it's safe to say Fallout 4's [increased popularity leading up to the show](https://www.gamereactor.eu/report-fallout-4-is-becoming-increasingly-popular-as-the-tv-series-approaches-1371553/) was just be beginning. Will you be returning to or finally purchase Fallout 4 now?

author: 小浪财讯
title: 1000ETF（159629）跌1.00%，半日成交额1.90亿元_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，1000ETF（159629）跌1.00%，报2.478元，成交额1.90亿元。1000ETF（159629）重仓股方面， 欧菲光 截止午盘跌1.52%， 恒玄科技 涨2.03%， 百济神州 跌1.21%， 麦格米特 涨2.06%， 联创光电 跌2.98%， 银轮股份 涨1.87%， 全志科技 跌0.54%， 南大光电 跌0.50%， 沃尔核材 跌0.42%， 四维图新 跌0.74%。
1000ETF（159629）业绩比较基准为 收益率，管理人为富国基金管理有限公司，基金经理为金泽宇、苏华清，成立（2022-07-27）以来回报为-11.82%，近一个月回报为1.54%。

author: UOL
title: Previsão do tempo aponta dia chuvoso hoje (13) para Búzios (RJ)
text:
Previsão do tempo aponta dia chuvoso hoje (13) para Búzios (RJ)
Búzios (RJ) deve ter dia chuvoso hoje (13). Segundo dados do Tempo Agora, a cidade tem previsão de temperaturas entre 22°C e 26°C e 35% de chance de chuvas ao longo desta sexta.
Tempo durante o dia em Búzios
Búzios começa o dia com termômetros marcando 23°C de madrugada e também 23°C na parte da manhã. Durante a tarde, a previsão é de 26°C. A sexta termina com 26°C.
Chuvas
Búzios hoje tem 35% de chance de chuva ao longo do dia.
Umidade
O nível de umidade relativa do ar para Búzios deve alternar entre 66% e 87%.
Ventos
Búzios deve registrar ventos em uma velocidade média de 19 km/h hoje, atingindo o maior índice de tarde km/h, com pico de 24 km/h.
Nascer e pôr do sol
Búzios terá o nascer do sol hoje às 04:56:44. O sol se põe às 18:27:37.
Temperaturas esperadas para a próxima semana em Búzios
- Sábado (14): 23°C a 28°C
- Domingo (15): 24°C a 29°C
- Segunda (16): 24°C a 28°C
- Terça (17): 23°C a 29°C
- Quarta (18): 22°C a 27°C
- Quinta (19): 22°C a 28°C
- Sexta (20): 24°C a 29°C
A [previsão do tempo](https://noticias.uol.com.br/previsao-do-tempo/) é baseada em dados colhidos por meteorologistas. Ela pode sofrer variações ao longo do dia que fujam dos modelos previstos.

author: Daily Excelsior
title: India Will Completely Get Rid Of Naxalism Under PM Modi’s Leadership In 3 Years: Amit Shah
text:
Sonitpur (Assam), Jan 20: Union Home Minister Amit Shah said on Saturday that under the leadership of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, the country will be cent per cent free of the problem of Naxalism in the next three years.
“I believe that in the next three years under Prime Minister Naredra Modi’s leadership, the country will completely get rid of the problem of Naxalism,” Shah said while speaking at the 60th Raising Day of Sashatra Seema Bal (SSB) in Assam’s Tezpur on Saturday.
Lauding the bravery of the SSB in fighting against Naxalism, Amit Shah said that along with the CRPF and the BSF, the SSB has brought the Naxal movement to an edge.
“Along with protecting the border of friendly countries of Nepal and Bhutan, the SSB has fought against Naxalites in Chhattisgarh, Jharkhand and Bihar. I have heard of your bravery whenever I have gone on review of Naxal operations in these areas,” Shah said.
Speaking on the role of the SSB in eliminating terrorism in Jammu and Kashmir, the Union Home Minister said, “In Jammu and Kashmir, the SSB has laid down their lives while fighting together with the CRPF, BSF, Jammu and Kashmir Police and the Indian Army against terrorists.”
Amit Shah said that the government has released a postal stamp to mark the occasion of the 60th Raising Day of SSB.
“Today on the occasion of the 60th Raising Day of Sashatra Seema Bal, the Government of India also released a postal stamp. It will keep the SSB’s devotion to duty alive in front of the people of the country forever.”
Shah said that the central government has taken several steps for the welfare of all the Central Armed Police Forces (CAPFs) including the Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) and other organizations.
“In the last nine years, Prime Minister Modi has taken several steps for the welfare of all the CAPFs, be it CRPF or all the other organizations deployed on the border like the SSB,” Shah said.
Speaking about the history of the SSB, Shah said, “The SSB has a rich history of being immersed in the service and protection of our country. After the India-China war, SSB was established in 1963 and after Atal ji (Former Prime Minister Atal Bihari Vajpayee) implemented the policy of ‘One Border One Force’, SSB has been dutifully protecting the India-Nepal border since 2001 and the India-Bhutan border since 2004.”
The Union Home Minister attended the 60th Raising Day of Sashatra Seema Bal at SSB Complex in Tezpur along with Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma. (Agencies)
India Will Completely Get Rid Of Naxalism Under PM Modi’s Leadership In 3 Years: Amit Shah
Sonitpur (Assam), Jan 20: Union Home Minister Amit Shah said on Saturday that under the leadership of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, the country will be cent per cent free of the problem of Naxalism in the next three years.
